title: Henry by the grace of God kyng of Engl[ãd] and of France, and lord of Ireland, to all and syngular archebisshops & bysshops, abbattis ...  to whome these p̃sent letters shall com sendeth grettyng know ye that of late by the wyng of our humble [su]bgiette Thomas Andrew of the parisshe of Southmymes in the counte of Midd. ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
notes: For a charitable contribution to relieve losses by fire.
Place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: creased and worn, with loss of text.
"Wytnes our selfe at Westm̃ the viii day of Februarii. The xi yere [of] our reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
